snippet: Many South Louisiana farmers are finding that it pays to look at a rice field and see a crayfish pond.
abstract: Many South Louisiana farmers are choosing to manage rice fields to help feed crayfish rather than grow crop itself, determining that crayfish are both cheaper to raise and more lucrative to sell.
lead_paragraph: Many South Louisiana farmers are finding that it pays to look at a rice field and see a crayfish pond.

headline.seo: In Louisiana, Farmers Use Rice Fields as Crayfish Ponds
headline.main: In Louisiana, Growing Rice to Trade on Some Creatures That Eat It
headline.print_headline: In South Louisiana, Growing Rice to Trade On Some Creatures That Eat It
